meta_description: "Upgrade your home with our 34" x 80" Plantation Louver Interior Door. Made with solid core wood and a 6-9/16" jamb size, this door is perfect for 2x6 wall construction. Choose from a variety of styles and finishes, including a primed surface. Single door option with black hinges and pre-drilled holes for easy installation. Manufacturer warranty included. Made in Vietnam. 100 characters."
meta_title: 34x80 Louver Right Handed Pre-Hung Passage Door | 6-9/16" Jamb | Black Hinges
